thread.title: North Korea main nuclear complex operational
thread.title_full: North Korea main nuclear complex operational | News24

author: news24.com
title: North Korea main nuclear complex operational
text:
Seoul - North Korea said on Tuesday its main nuclear complex was operating and it was working to improve the "quality and quantity" of weapons which it could use against the United States at "any time."
The comments on North Korea's official news agency came after its space agency said late on Monday it was readying a new satellite for launch, indicating it may fire an upgraded long-range ballistic missile timed around the 70th anniversary of its ruling party on October 10.
Any such launch would violate international sanctions although the North insists it would be part of a space program for peaceful purposes.
The United States, which has 28 000 military personnel in South Korea, called on North Korea to "refrain from irresponsible provocations that aggravate regional tensions."
